result = (/\.google\.cn/).test(baseUrl) ? decodeURIComponent(baseUrl.replace(/^.+[&?]text=/, '')) : String(java.getString('html')).replace(/(?:\n\s*,\s*)+\n*?$/, ''); result = String(result).replace(/]+>/ig, '

');
